Reference

All functions

AirFireModelingEnv

Utilities for working with USFS AirFire BlueSky model output

ModelDataDir

Directory for Modeling Data

bluesky_download()

Download BlueSky model data from AirFire

bluesky_downloaded()

List downloaded models

bluesky_findModels()

Find models covering a location

bluesky_load()

Load data for a single BlueSky model

bluesky_modelInfo

BlueSky Model Information

bluesky_toCommonFormat()

Convert BlueSky NetCDF output to modernized NetCDF

getModelDataDir()

Get Package Data Directory

monitor_toRaster()

Create a Raster from monitor object

raster_aggregate()

Aggregate multiple BlueSky model runs into a single RasterBrick object

raster_createTimeStrings()

Create raster layer time string

raster_facet()

Small multiples map of BlueSky model output

raster_isRaster()

Test for Raster\* class

raster_leaflet()

Raster Leaflet Map

raster_load()

Load BlueSky model data

raster_map()

Geographic map of BlueSky model output

raster_spaghettiPlot()

Spaghetti Plot

raster_subsetByDistance()

Subset a Raster* by distance from a location

raster_subsetByPolygon()

Subset a Raster* by polygon

raster_toMonitor()

Create a PWFSLSmoke ws_monitor object from a Raster\* object

setModelDataDir()

Set Package Data Directory
